title: Masculine or feminine: your role in society

description: In live interviews, people with differing backgrounds and attitudes examine "masculine" and "feminine" roles in society during the 1970's. In the wake of feminism as a social context of the time (1970), this film examines how the explicit boundaries dividing masculinity and femininity have become increasingly blurred. Areas looked at are work, domesticity and marriage.
